values: （用于连接单词或词组）和；与；及；以及；且；而且；并；并且；加；加上；另；（用于整数和分数之间）又；然后；接着；那么；因此；所以；于是（用于表示结果）
（常作复数ands）附加条件；附加条款；额外细节

bilingual.source: Paul and I are short and our hair is fair.
bilingual.target: 保罗和我个子矮，我们的头发是浅色的。

bilingual.source: The prize is for Jodie and me!

bilingual.target: 爱丽丝和杰克是表兄妹。
贾伯和马赞有一个姑姑吗？

bilingual.source: He used to be so shy and quiet.

list.abstract: AND（英[ənd]，美[ænd]），英语单词，作连词用，为和，与；并且。作名词用，为与；也指安道尔。短语搭配有and so on（等等；诸如此类），例句为“A good chess boxer needs to be both strong and smart.（一个好的国际象棋拳击手需要既强壮又聪明。）” AND连词类近义词有grant、edet、but等。
AND是一个运算符，用于对两个表达式进行逻辑与运算。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, that's cucumber and cream cheese. That's turkey and loganberry.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，这是黄瓜和奶油芝士，还有鸡肉和罗甘莓。

yingyinNormal.en: Stills and Frank are excellent choices. Sol and Bender, sir.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斯蒂尔和法兰克是很好的选择。教授，我选索尔和本德。

yingyinNormal.en: Frogs and worms and Butterflies!
yingyinNormal.zh: 青蛙，小虫和蝴蝶。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello, it's Mummy Rabbit with Rebecca and Richard.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你好，我们是兔妈妈和瑞贝卡和理查德。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George are at the playground with their friends.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩琪和乔治和朋友们在游乐场里玩。

yingyinNormal.en: And a living will and durable power of attorney.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有生前遗嘱和永久委托书。

yingyinNormal.en: And you're wrong about hinduism and cows.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而且你在印度教和牛的问题上是错的。

yingyinNormal.en: It's Mrs Duck and her friends.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是鸭妈妈和她的朋友们。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George are playing in Mummy and Daddy's bedroom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩佩和乔治在爸爸妈妈的卧室玩耍。

yingyinNormal.en: I've ordered chicken and salad and cake for 150.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我订了一百五十人份的鸡肉，沙拉和蛋糕。

yingyinNormal.en: You and me. We ruined her life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你和我，我们毁了她的生活

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George are painting today.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩奇和乔治今天要画画。

yingyinNormal.en: And yet, you can't speak to women.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可你还是不敢和女人说话。

yingyinNormal.en: We had to remove your ovaries and uterus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 必须摘除卵巢和子宫。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George have come to play again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩佩和乔治又来玩了。

yingyinNormal.en: I encourage patience and restraint.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我希望你忍耐和克制一下。

yingyinNormal.en: We used to play tag and stuff.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们常常玩捉迷藏和其他游戏。

yingyinNormal.en: Gertrud and I, we are getting a divorce.
yingyinNormal.zh: 格楚德和我决定离婚了。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George love feeding the ducks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩佩和乔治喜欢喂鸭子。

yingyinNormal.en: George and I saw Father Christmas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔治和我都见到圣诞老爷爷。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 和; 与; 同; 又; 而
结果是; 那么; 就
接连; 又; 愈来愈

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 因果性；因果律；因果关系；因果作用

sense_info_list.zh: 和; 与; 同; 又; 而

examination_example.sentence: Find out about their lives <highlight>and</highlight> interests beyond the job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 了解他们在工作之外的生活和兴趣。

examination_example.sentence: We think of it simply as a healthy <highlight>and</highlight> helpful flow of intelligent thought.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们仅将它视为一种健康有益的智慧思绪。

examination_example.sentence: This is where supermarkets <highlight>and</highlight> their anonymity come in handy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这正是超市和它的匿名性发挥作用的地方。

examination_example.sentence: Climb high <highlight>and</highlight> look for signs of human habitation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 爬到高处，寻找人类居住的迹象。

examination_example.sentence: Kennedy wrote that the rule "limited states' ability to seek long-term prosperity <highlight>and</highlight> has prevented market participants from competing on an even playing field."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 肯尼迪写道，这一规定限制了国家寻求长期繁荣的能力，并阻止了市场参与者在一个公平的竞争环境中竞争。

examination_example.sentence: If you have surplus vegetables, you'll do a vegetable soup, <highlight>and</highlight> all fruits threatening to "go off" will be cooked or juiced.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果家里有多余的蔬菜，可以做成蔬菜汤，那些可能会坏掉的水果可以当成食材做饭或者榨成果汁。

sense_info_list.zh: 结果是; 那么; 就

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>And</highlight> they were right.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 结果是他们是对的。

examination_example.sentence: Waiting lists increase all the time <highlight>and</highlight> we are simply not building enough new homes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 排队等房的名单还在增加，我们盖的新房却远远不够。

examination_example.sentence: But take a longer view <highlight>and</highlight> there is a surprising amount that we can say with considerable assurance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是当从更长远的眼光来看，我们可以相当肯定地发表更多，数量惊人。

sense_info_list.zh: 接连; 又; 愈来愈

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 黑白的；是非分明的；正反明确的；警车
起伏；兴衰；幸运与不幸的交替

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Although exhausting, it gave me energy, enthusiasm <highlight>and</highlight> happiness.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然很累，但它带给了我活力、热情和快乐。

examination_example.sentence: Jim says we can stay in his house as long as we leave it clean <highlight>and</highlight> tidy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 吉姆说我们可以住在他的房子里，只要我们保持干净整洁。

examination_example.sentence: You can have it served with beans <highlight>and</highlight> mushrooms.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以配豆子和蘑菇吃。

word_usage.usage: and连接的前后几个部分在结构上应该对等。
否定句中，并列成分之间不用and连接，而要用or 来连接。
在三个及以上的并列结构中，and往往置于最后两者之间。若每两者之间均用and连接，则表示强调。

不可以在连词and后面加“,”。如：
I became sick at that dinner party, and, in the future, I will avoid such forays into the social world. （×）
I became sick at that dinner party, and in the future, I will avoid such forays into the social world. （√）

读和写；读写；阅读和写作

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: We could fly at 480 km per hour, avoiding traffic lights <highlight>and</highlight> busy roads.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以以每小时480公里的速度飞行，避开红绿灯和繁忙的道路。

examination_example.sentence: A good chess boxer needs to be both strong <highlight>and</highlight> smart.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个好的国际象棋拳击手需要既强壮又聪明。

examination_example.sentence: However, if it goes long, you will achieve all your goals <highlight>and</highlight> be successful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，如果它持续很长时间，你将实现你所有的目标并获得成功。

examination_example.sentence: This conversation changed Wang Kai's mind <highlight>and</highlight> he chose to stay at the school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这次谈话改变了王凯的想法，然后他选择留在学校。

examination_example.sentence: They tend to go back to bed on their own <highlight>and</highlight> won’t remember it in the morning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们往往会自己回去睡觉，然后早上起来就不记得了。

examination_example.sentence: They  immediately（立刻） became friends <highlight>and</highlight> start to play at each other's houses on the weekend.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们很快就成了朋友，然后周末开始在对方家里玩。

examination_example.sentence: Ren is one of the virtues <highlight>and</highlight> people who believe in it will love everyone in the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仁是美德之一，而相信它的人会爱世界上的每一个人。

examination_example.sentence: It drinks juice from tree roots <highlight>and</highlight> it is covered in a hard shell.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它喝树根的汁液，而它被一层硬壳包裹着。

examination_example.sentence: In the dam are many turbines <highlight>and</highlight> on each turbine there is an electric generator.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大坝里有许多涡轮机，并且每个涡轮机上都有一台发电机。

examination_example.sentence: More <highlight>and</highlight> more people get to know the balalaika <highlight>and</highlight> are attracted by its Russian style music.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 越来越多的人开始了解三弦琴，并被其俄罗斯风格的音乐所吸引。
